description: Easy to use, and easy to find recipes, that are presented in a easy to follow format. Instructions, and ingredients required, etc, are in a clear and consise manner
summary: Highly recommended for anyone into trying new things

description:
I see quite many recipes that miss ingredients in the list, and are even wrongly categorized (search for vegan for a good laugh).
Instead of manual curation, I would like to see collections of *favourites* by user, and the ability to fork recipes and make variations. In general some more user-networking functionality would help to get a more interesting personalized view.
summary: Interesting concept, but needs some moderation/curation

description:
No settings to force the programs to use EU SI units - out of the box the app converts all units to US units - not usable in EU., sorry!
GUI is nice, though
summary: Nice GUI, but bad unit conversion

description:
The app has a nice interface all be it a little confusing. No straight forward top menu. However it lacks features that would be very useful. Like an import tool for Gourmet Recipe database. Also web page import. 

This app would suit the occasional user with a few recipes, but at over 800 recipes I am not entering them one at a time. Keep up the developement will try later
summary: Nice, But not a replacement for Gourmet Recipe Manager

description: I hope more recipes will be added!

Really wanted to use this. Since Gourmet Recipe did not want to work out of the box on Ubuntu 20.04. This was the only alternative. However without an import feature any but a few recipes, would be a bear to switch to this.
summary: Not for an established recipe collection

description: But it crashes. A lot. It consistently crashes when I export my recipe library as a back-up, too. I've only added 3 recipes. I had to do this by hand, there's no import method. I'm nervous about adding more as I don't want my library of recipes to become corrupt.
summary: I want to enjoy this app

description:
This has been a problem on their Gitlab for almost 3 years now. Converts "3 ½ cup" to "3 cup, ⅒ tsp" for example. This is incorrect, way off. It forces you to convert it to their (incorrect) measurements. The purpose of this is to adjust portion size, but it plain does not work.
Adding your own recipes is useless because of this, and it's very possible some of their own recipes are incorrect.

Je viens de tester la version 2.04 sous Ubuntu 20.04. Je n'aime pas donner une mauvaise note. Mais je m'attendais à trouver en me fiant aux quelques lignes de présentation de cett application à pouvoir consulter un fonds de base de données composé des recettes partagées par l'ensemble des autres utilisateurs, dans le monde entier, mais malheureusement on dirait que la finalisation de cette appli n'est pas allée jusqu'à son terme, puisqu'il n'y a rien d'autre, qu'une triste page pour saisir ses propres recettes. Et dans mon cas elles sont rares, et en plus pas terribles. Déception, snif ! C'est un bon début, la version suivante sera sûrement bien meilleure ! 😍️

Application trop rigide, notamment dans l'introduction des ingrédients. Non traduite en français. Recettes proposées peu nombreuses et pas très réalistes. Application instable soius Fedora 32. Ne sauvegarde pas les recettes. Franchement autant prendre un crayon et un cahier, ça va plus vite et c'est plus efficace !
App très intéressante mais toujours pas de traduction malgrés les années.
Добавьте пожалуйста перевод на Русский язык.
